page.title: 13PASTIMES & TRAQUAIR PUPILS
page.content: MOST CHILDREN PREFER TO GO SWIMMING FOR AN ACTIVE PASTIME WITH VARIOUS OTHER SPORTS INCLUDING JOGGING, TABLE TENNIS, RUNNING AND CYCLING. MOST CHILDREN GO TO PEEBLES SWIMMING POOL. NEARLY HALF OF THE CHILDREN ARE KEEN READERS AND A FEW HAVE COLLECTIONS INCLUDING SOAPS, STICKERS AND STAMPS. NATURE STUDY, PET CARE, FLOWER COLLECTING AND PRESSING ARE FURTHER CENTRES OF INTEREST. EIGHT GIRLS GO TO BROWNIES IN INNERLEITHEN AND TWO GIRLS GO TO DANCING LESSONS WHILE SOME CHILDREN ALSO HAVE PIANO, VIOLIN AND GUITAR LESSONS. MOST OF THE PUPILS OVER SEVEN YEARS PLAY THE RECORDER. AMONG THE MORE UNUSUAL HOBBIES ARE WORKING MODEL TRAINS, FALCONRY AND AN INTEREST IN VILLAGE CAR RALLIES. ALOMOST ALL THE CHILDREN WATCH SOME T.V. EVERY DAY. ALL THE CHILDREN ARE INTERESTED IN NATURAL ENVIRONMENT.
